name: First Heavy to land on YYC's New Runway - Air Transat A330 ᴴᴰ
description:
After the two largest airlines at Calgary International Airport made the first landings on YYC's new runway, it seems fitting that onew of the largest carriers at YYC would perform the first landing ever performed by a wide-body aircraft on that runway. Once again I'm sorry for all the shakiness and wind noise, I was up on top of a very large hill and I was fairly susceptible to wind up there. I hope you'll enjoy, nonetheless. Please keep in mind that access to this spot was opened up only temporarily for the first operations on the new runway, and it's now impossible to reach, since it's right in the middle of a large construction site. Once all the construction clears up, I'll be able to shoot from here again, hopefully.

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Air Transat (TSC/TS)
Aircraft: Airbus A330-200
Registration: C-GPTS
Route: AMS-YYC
Callsign: Transat 373 Heavy
Runway used: 35R
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/CGPTS
